mapper.select: SELECT id,company_name,company_no,juridical_person,juridical_phone,contacts,contact_phone,email,area_name,area_code, address,company_type,product_type,enabled,delete_flag,create_by,create_time,update_by,update_time,extend_field,remark FROM sh_company WHERE company_type = #{companyType} and delete_flag = 0
